description: Xianyun, nota anche come Cloud Retainer, è un personaggio di supporto Anemo e healer, specializzata nel potenziare la mobilità e la guarigione del team.
info: Xianyun si concentra su HP% e Healing Bonus per massimizzare la guarigione. Energy Recharge è utile per uptime costante del Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cloudfall Jade
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive attacks with her catalyst.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive attacks with her catalyst.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to deal AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the power of Anemo, plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies along the path and dealing AoE Anemo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: White Clouds at Dawn
skills.desc: Xianyun creates a field that heals allies and deals Anemo DMG to enemies.
skills.details_html:
White Clouds at Dawn
Xianyun creates a field that heals allies and deals Anemo DMG to enemies.

skills.name: Stars Gather at Dusk
skills.desc: Xianyun summons the power of the clouds, granting all party members increased jump height and healing over time.
skills.details_html:
Stars Gather at Dusk
Xianyun summons the power of the clouds, granting all party members increased jump height and healing over time.

passive_talents.name: Aloft on Cloud Nine
passive_talents.desc: Increases the healing bonus of all party members by 10% when inside the field created by White Clouds at Dawn.

passive_talents.name: Cloud Transcendence
passive_talents.desc: Characters affected by Stars Gather at Dusk gain 15% increased jump height and 10% increased healing received.

passive_talents.name: Cloud Retainer's Blessing
passive_talents.desc: When Xianyun crafts Character Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

constellations.name: Crane Soars Skyward
constellations.desc: White Clouds at Dawn's healing is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Clouds Gather, Rain Falls
constellations.desc: Stars Gather at Dusk grants an additional 10% Anemo DMG Bonus to all party members.

constellations.name: Wings Unfurled
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Stars Gather at Dusk by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Heavenly Guidance
constellations.desc: Characters affected by Stars Gather at Dusk gain 15% increased Movement SPD.

constellations.name: Clouds Part, Sun Shines
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of White Clouds at Dawn by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cloud Retainer's Legacy
constellations.desc: Characters affected by Stars Gather at Dusk gain 20% increased ATK.
